text: Abdourahmane Barry (born 21 February 2000) is a professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Ligue 2 club Amiens and the Guinea national team. == Club career == Barry started playing football professionally on 27 July 2018 in the 2. Liga. He played his first full game against SV Horn. ==Personal life== Barry was born in Courbevoie, France and is of Guinean descent. == References== == Other websites == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from ÃŽle-de-France Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Liefering players Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de- Seine Category:People from Courbevoie
title: Abdourahmane Barry
